name: Format\TableColumnSelector
description: The object for defining conditions that will cause a conditional style to be applied to a column.

properties.name: columnIndex
properties.description: Specifies a column index. The leftmost column of data has an index of 0. The specified column will be selected.

properties.name: descriptor
properties.description: Specifies the identifier of a specific data descriptor. All columns for this data descriptor will be selected. See DataDescriptor.

properties.name: odd
properties.description: When true, selects the odd columns.

properties.name: even
properties.description: When true, selects the even columns.
